page.title: 13RECREATION -SPORTS
page.content: The village has no public sports facilities,but the school field is used for practice.Football matches are played on fields lent by farmers. Despite this lack,there are 2 mens soccer teams and 2 womens teams who play in local leagues.The womens A team are S.W.champions this year.One player has been picked to play for England. The cricket team has its own grounds and club house at Killigarth near Polperro.Like the soccer clubs,players are drawn from the surrounding area. A tug-o-war team was recently formed and is doing well.Winter training in the school hall. The Mens Institute has 4 snooker and 2 billiard teams.The pub has a darts team.There are no sports clubs for teenagers.A survey showed 60% never go to a sporting event and only 5%go ofte
